rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: A 41-year-old man in China's eastern province of Jiangsu has been confirmed as the first human case of infection with a rare strain of bird flu known as H10N3, Beijing's National Health Commission (NHC) said on Tuesday.
